Name: Mars Colonization
About the game: The time has finally come when we can enjoy a new stage in human development! The Mars Colonization game is a simulator about human adaptation to unknown conditions. The main hero and his team have finally landed on Mars and are ready to expand humanity on this planet. Your mission is to mobilize and start creating and developing the environment where you will live by creating energy production stations and not only. Everyone is keeping an eye on you and is dying to hear from you that they can come. Good Luck! Game Features : - Collection of ores for production - Team Support - Continuous evolution
